headline: Avast Expands Identity Protection Solution to Help Tackle Rise in Scam and Identity Theft
summary: Avast, a leader in digital security and privacy and part of Gen™ (NASDAQ: GEN), has expanded the availability of its identity protection solution, Avast Secure Identity, to help people around the world keep their identity safer from escalating scam and identity theft risks.
